Class TimeUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gedder.gedderalarm.util.TimeUtilities

  • public final class TimeUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains general time-related utilities.

    • Method Detail

      • getMillisUntil

        public static long getMillisUntil(int day,
                                  int hour,
                                  int minute)
        Gets the time until some specified day, hour, and minute combination, from today. Recommended to instead use getMillisUntil(Calendar) to avoid IllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        day - A day number where 1 = Sunday, 2 = Monday, ..., 7 = Saturday.
        hour - An hour between 0 and 23 for the 24-hour clock.
        minute - A minute between 0 and 59.
        Returns:
        The milliseconds from now until the specified time in the future..

      • getMillisUntil

        public static long getMillisUntil(java.util.Calendar future)
        Gets the time until some specified day, hour, and minute combination, from today.
        Parameters:
        future - A calendar containing the day, hour, and minute to calculate the number of milliseconds up to.
        Returns:
        The milliseconds from now until the specified time in the future.

      • getMillis

        public static long getMillis(int hour,
                             int minute)
        Gets the number of milliseconds one can count in the hour and minute inputs. Equivalent to counting up to that time since midnight.
        Parameters:
        hour -
        minute -
        Returns:
        The amount of milliseconds in the hour and minute input.

      • getMillisSinceMidnight

        public static long getMillisSinceMidnight(int hour,
                                          int minute)
        Gets the time since midnight up to hour:minute.
        Parameters:
        hour - The hour to count up to since midnight.
        minute - The minute to count up to since midnight.
        Returns:
        The time since midnight up to hour:minute in milliseconds.

      • getMillisSinceMidnight

        public static long getMillisSinceMidnight()

        Returns:
        the milliseconds since midnight up to now.
